name: Dasher (itch) (Choppers)
description:
This game was created for the MashUp Game Jam 2.

Theme: Unconventional Means

Use left click to dash around the arena. Dash into enemies that circle you to kill them. Watch out though, as they will shoot at you, and you will have to dodge their bullets.

This game uses the unconventional means of killing enemies with a dash instead of a projectile for the shoot-em-up genre.
